sentences.en: "A deal!" she said contemptuously, "I hate all deals."
sentences.cn: “交易！”她鄙夷地说，“我厌恶一切交易。”

sentences.en: Exercising the body does a great deal to improve one's health.
sentences.cn: 锻炼身体对增进健康大有益处。

sentences.en: he lost a deal of blood.
sentences.cn: 他大量失血。

sentences.en: He promised to appoint an AIDS czar to deal with the disease.
sentences.cn: 他许诺任命一位艾滋病大使来应对这种疾病。

sentences.en: He tried to profiteer from this dirty deal.
sentences.cn: 他想在这笔肮脏的交易中捞一把。

sentences.en: How could I deal with them before?
sentences.cn: 我以前是怎样处理它们的?。

sentences.en: I agree with you on how to deal with it .
sentences.cn: 关于此事如何处理，我同意你的看法。

sentences.en: I don't know a great deal about politics.
sentences.cn: 我不太懂政治。

sentences.en: I have tried to pack a good deal into a few words.
sentences.cn: 我尽量言简意赅。

sentences.en: I'll deal with the children later.
sentences.cn: 孩子们的事由我以后去处理。

sentences.en: If the Commission has its way, the entire deal will be scuppered.
sentences.cn: 如果委员会我行我素的话，整个交易将化为泡影。

sentences.en: Last November the commission gave its stamp of approval to the deal.
sentences.cn: 去年11月，委员会核准了这宗交易。

sentences.en: Many users end up dealing to support their habit.
sentences.cn: 许多吸毒者最后都是靠做毒品买卖来供自己吸毒。

sentences.en: People usually complain about having to deal with too much bureaucracy.
sentences.cn: 人们经常抱怨不得不应付太多的繁文缛节。

sentences.en: So how to you deal with all this when it inevitably arises?
sentences.cn: 所以当这些事情不可避免的发生时，你该怎么处理呢呢?。

sentences.en: The deal ended after a series of rancorous disputes.
sentences.cn: 经过一连串充满敌意的争吵，交易泡汤了。

sentences.en: The deal seems so attractive it would be ridiculous to say no.
sentences.cn: 这笔交易看上去太诱人了，要是拒绝它简直是笑话。

sentences.en: The deal was a long shot, but Bagley had little to lose.
sentences.cn: 这桩交易有些冒险，不过巴格利也没什么可损失的。

sentences.en: The deal was put on ice for three months.
sentences.cn: 该交易被搁置了3个月。

sentences.en: The deal with Chelsea may not, however, be dead.
sentences.cn: 不过，与切尔西的交易或许还有戏。

sentences.en: The president beat his breast and called that deal a mistake.
sentences.cn: 总裁捶胸顿足，称那是个错误的交易。

sentences.en: The prime minister promised farmers a new deal (= a new and fairer system ) .
sentences.cn: 首相向农民保证推行一项新政策。

sentences.en: they don't make a big deal out of minor irritations.
sentences.cn: 他们并不小题大做。

sentences.en: They have been calling the Presidency decision a backroom deal.
sentences.cn: 他们称总统人选问题是个幕后交易。

sentences.en: They made a deal to sell the land to a property developer.
sentences.cn: 他们达成了协议把这块地卖给房地产开发商。

sentences.en: They were burned by the phony stock deal.
sentences.cn: 他们在那虚假的股票交易中遭受损失。

sentences.en: Whether such properties are a good deal will depend on individual situations.
sentences.cn: 这样的地产是否可获得大笔收益还要视具体情形而定。

sentences.en: Whose turn is it to deal?
sentences.cn: 轮到谁发牌了？

phrases.tran_cn: n. 大人物；了不起的事
达成协议，达成交易；最后达成决定性的协议
(非正式)就这么办，就这么定了
新政（美国总统罗斯福的国内政策和政府）
一揽子交易；[经]整批交易；成套交易

trans.tran_cn: 交易，协议，待遇，很多，发牌
trans.tran_en: treatment of a particular type that is given or received
to give playing cards to each of the players in a game
to give playing cards to each of the players in a game
